Package simplenlg.lexicon.lexicalitems

Interface Summary
LexicalItem The basic interface that any element stored in a simplenlg.lexicon.Lexicon must implement.
 

Class Summary
Adjective This class extends the ContentWord abstract class for Adjectives.
ContentWord This is an abstract implementation of the LexicalItem interface, which implements a number of additional simplenlg.features inherited by the classes Noun, Verb, Adjective and Symbol.
Noun This class extends the ContentWord abstract class for nouns.
Symbol This class extends the ContentWord abstract class to the special category of symbols.
Verb This class extends the ContentWord abstract class for verbs.
 

Enum Summary
Category This is an enumeration of the grammatical categories which are relevant to the Lexicon package.
Conjunction  
Determiner This enum extends the ContentWord abstract class for determiners.
Pronoun This enum extends the ContentWord abstract class for the personal pronouns.
